r.s: SQL database XML definition tool for DDL creation and differencing
r.d:
Database definition tool for creation or upgrade of an existing database with a "SQL compiler" approach.
Database upgrade DDL/DML/DCL is generated from source XML, without connecting to the target database.
http://dbsteward.org/
r.n:
DBSteward 1.3.4 Release
Changes * Fix false negative sequence replication detection when pgsql8 table is partitioned * pgsql8 composite type definition support * mysql5 identifier case sensitivity when diffing * pgsql8 duplicate and multi-dimensional index extraction bugs fixed * Command-line switch handling improved to not override with defaults in some contexts * Vast improvement on static data row diffing speed when overlaying large static datas * pgsql8 Reorder function defintion location for pgsql8 %TYPE usage when defining functions * mysql5 don't try to process multiple schemas when not in mysql5 schema prefix mode
Supported Platform DDL Generation and Differencing: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8 * mssql10 - Microsoft SQL Server 2008 * mysql5 - MySQL 5
Supported Platform Structure Extraction into XML: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8 * mysql5 - MySQL 5
